com.mr.moviecatalogue.service

Class DatabaseService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mr.moviecatalogue.service.DatabaseService

  • @Component
public class DatabaseService
extends java.lang.Object
    This service class handles all of the application's interactions with the database

    • Method Detail

      • connectToDatabase

        public java.sql.Connection connectToDatabase()
        This method attempts to connect to the database for the project, and if it is not already present, creates the database and tables in the PostgreSQL instance
        Returns:
        Returns the Connection to the database

      • dropDatabase

        public void dropDatabase()
        Drops the database from the SQL server, clearing any data.

      • getAllMovies

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Movie> getAllMovies()
        Returns all movies in the database in a Map
        Returns:
        A HashMap with all the movies in the database, keyed by their title

      • addMovie

        public void addMovie(MovieIO movieIO)
        Adds the given movie to the database
        Parameters:
        movieIO - MovieIO containing the mandatory title primary key and optional director and rating values

      • getMovieByTitle

        public Movie getMovieByTitle(java.lang.String title)
        Gets a movie from the database by searching for the provided title. This parameter is case sensitive.
        Parameters:
        title - Title to search the database for
        Returns:
        Returns a Movie object for the provided title

      • getMoviesByDirector

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Movie> getMoviesByDirector(java.lang.String director)
        Gets all the movies from the database directed by the given director. Allows the use of * or % allow partial queries e.g. Ben* will return all movies for all directors with the first name Ben. The input string is not case sensitive.
        Parameters:
        director - Director name to be searched for. Can contain wildcard characters * or % e.g. Ben* or Ben% will return all movies for all directors starting with Ben
        Returns:
        A HashMap containing all the movies by the given director, keyed by title

      • getMoviesAboveRating

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Movie> getMoviesAboveRating(java.lang.Float rating)
        Gets all the movies from the database with a rating value above or equal to the given rating
        Parameters:
        rating - Rating to be searched for all movies above this rating.
        Returns:
        A HashMap containing all the movies above the given rating, keyed by title

      • getMoviesByDirectorAboveRating

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Movie> getMoviesByDirectorAboveRating(java.lang.String director,
                                                                            java.lang.Float rating)
        Gets all the movies from the database directed by the given director and above the given rating. Allows the use of * or % to allow partial queries e.g. Ben* will return all movies for all directors with the first name Ben. The input string is not case sensitive. The movies returned are all above or equal to the given rating.
        Parameters:
        rating - Rating to be searched for all movies above this rating.
        director - Director name to be searched for. Can contain wildcard characters * or % e.g. Ben* or Ben% will return all movies for all directors starting with Ben
        Returns:
        A HashMap containing all the movies in the database by the given director and above the given rating, keyed by title.

      • updateTitle

        public void updateTitle(java.lang.String currentTitle,
                        java.lang.String newTitle)
        Updates the title of the movie in the database.
        Parameters:
        currentTitle - current title of movie to be updated
        newTitle - new title to be set

      • updateDirector

        public void updateDirector(java.lang.String title,
                           java.lang.String director)
        Updates the director of the movie in the database for the given title.
        Parameters:
        title - title of movie to be updated
        director - Director name to be set

      • updateRating

        public void updateRating(java.lang.String title,
                         java.lang.Float rating)
        Updates the rating of the movie in the database for the given title.
        Parameters:
        title - title of movie to be updated
        rating - rating to be set

      • deleteMovie

        public void deleteMovie(java.lang.String title)
        Deletes the movie from the database for the given title. Title is case insensitive.
        Parameters:
        title - title of movie to be deleted

      • deleteDirector

        public void deleteDirector(java.lang.String director)
        Sets the director column to null for all movies with the given director. Case insensitive.
        Parameters:
        director - director to be deleted from all movies they are currently set in
